title: How to Marry Flora in Harvest Moon

steps.headline: Go to the Excavation Site at 11:00 pm to 12:00 am.
Flora can have any heart color.
Go to the Inner Inn in the lobby at 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm.
steps.description: Don't do this on a Tuesday, however.

steps.headline: Check to see if Flora has a purple heart.
steps.description: If she doesn't, then this won't work.

steps.headline: Ask Flora to get her favorite drink in a different store.
Walk from Vesta's farm to the water fall area at 11:00 pm to 12:00 am.
steps.description: Don't do this on a Sunday however or it won't work. It has to be sunny.

steps.headline: Check to see if Flora has a blue heart colour.
steps.description: If she doesn't, then this won't work.

steps.headline: Go to the Excavation site at 7:30 pm to 8:00.
steps.description: This won't work if it is not sunny or if it is a Tuesday.

steps.headline: Check to see if Flora has a yellow heart colour.
steps.description: Flora needs to have a yellow heart colour at least.

steps.headline: When Flora has an orange heart color, buy a blue feather.
When Flora has a red heart colour, give the feather to her.
steps.description: By doing this, you are proposing to her and it means that you want to marry her. If she accepts (which she will, if the heart colour is red), then you will have a wedding with her in a week.

text: Black Heart Event Go to the Excavation Site at 11:00 pm to 12:00 am.  Flora can have any heart color.  Pick "Watch for a bit".  Purple Heart Event Go to the Inner Inn in the lobby at 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm. Don't do this on a Tuesday, however. Check to see if Flora has a purple heart. If she doesn't, then this won't work. Ask Flora to get her favorite drink in a different store.  Blue Heart Event Walk from Vesta's farm to the water fall area at 11:00 pm to 12:00 am. Don't do this on a Sunday however or it won't work. It has to be sunny. Check to see if Flora has a blue heart colour. If she doesn't, then this won't work. Go with Flora.  Yellow Heart Event Go to the Excavation site at 7:30 pm to 8:00. This won't work if it is not sunny or if it is a Tuesday. Check to see if Flora has a yellow heart colour. Flora needs to have a yellow heart colour at least. Say you just came in.  Final Steps When Flora has an orange heart color, buy a blue feather.  When Flora has a red heart colour, give the feather to her. By doing this, you are proposing to her and it means that you want to marry her. If she accepts (which she will, if the heart colour is red), then you will have a wedding with her in a week.
